title: BRIEF-Centaurus Metals Executes Sale & Purchase Agreement With Vale For Jaguar Nickel Sulphide Project
text:
BRIEF-Centaurus Metals Executes Sale & Purchase Agreement With Vale For Jaguar Nickel Sulphide Project

Commodities Sep 05, 2019 10:00

BRIEF-Centaurus Metals Executes Sale & Purchase Agreement With Vale For Jaguar Nickel Sulphide Project Sept 5 (Reuters) - Centaurus Metals Ltd : * CO AND VALE EXECUTED SALE & PURCHASE AGREEMENT FOR JAGUAR NICKEL SULPHIDE PROJECT IN NORTHERN BRAZIL * SETTLEMENT OF ACQUISITION REMAINS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY BRAZILIAN NATIONAL BANK FOR ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT * CENTAURUS METALS - VALE AND CO HAVE ALSO AGREED TO ENTER INTO A FUTURE OFF-TAKE AGREEMENT WHEREBY VALE CAN PURCHASE 100% OF PRODUCTION FROM PROJECT

BRIEF-Centaurus Metals Executes Sale & Purchase Agreement With Vale For Jaguar Nickel Sulphide Project
description: BRIEF-Centaurus Metals Executes Sale & Purchase Agreement With Vale For Jaguar Nickel Sulphide Project
